channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-8664] Use Apache Curator in JDBC Driver and HiveServer2 for better reliability
item.description: Curator provides well defined reliability on top of ZooKeeper. Should be using that instead of plain ZooKeeper clients.
item.summary: Use Apache Curator in JDBC Driver and HiveServer2 for better reliability

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: hagleitn Possible to add this to 14? W/o this there might be some issues with dynamic service discovery in HS2.
